  def foo
    url = URI.parse('http://localhost:8000/zmagic_objproxy')
    req = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url.path)
    req.basic_auth 'bcuser', 'minisap'
    res = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port).start {|http| http.request(req) }
    output = res.body
    req.add_field('Cookie',res.get_fields('set-cookie'))
    res = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port).start {|http| http.request(req) }
    output += res.body    
    render_text output
        
  end
end
